parameter.name: DefaultCS-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultCS Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: metadata=res://*/Model1.csdl|res://*/Model1.ssdl|res://*/Model1.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="Data Source=.;Initial Catalog=MAPS;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=ros;Password=ptpl123!;MultipleActiveResultSets=True"
